Reviews.Title: LOVE this laptop
Reviews.Author: bkabat
Reviews.Content: I was a little bit nervous purchasing this laptop considering the specs listed on amazon's site are different. The top of the page says the computer has Windows NT operating system and the bottom said Windows 8. I took a chance and ordered the computer and I LOVE it.Its very fast and picture quality is amazing. I love that it has an HDMI output. My only computer only had VGA. The difference in streaming video on the computer and onto the tv is amazing.Windows 8 is taking a little while to get used to. I was using Windows 7 previously but I'm starting to get the hang of it.The laptop is light weight, sleek and the keyboard feels good on your hands. Overall I def recommend this product. I think everyone will love it!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: patterson
Reviews.Content: recieved my computer in only 2 business days. and love it so far. I dont really like windows 8 but the computer is great

Reviews.Title: arrived in a secure package
Reviews.Author: jenel
Reviews.Content: this is a wonderful laptop.  it is my first and the instructions were easy to set it up. i love it.

Reviews.Title: So Far It's Doing Well
Reviews.Author: C. Taylor
Reviews.Content: I recommend this laptop.Used exclusively for work to demonstrate videos and photos to customers... play internet radio. It's fast enough with adequate memory and speed for what I use it for. Arrived on time (Prime is worth getting if you use Amazon a lot pay over $80 in shipping a year).This is my 2nd HP and the other (HP G6) is still doing fine (8GB RAM)... I upgraded to 8GB RAM through Crucial [dot ]com and it runs over 12 hours a day and has been doing so since Fall of 2011. This model (4GB RAM) is capable of 8GB RAM for even better performance. Note that this comes with Windows 8 and I think runs better than my G6 where I upgraded from Win 7.Get these 2 modules:Crucial CT3695417or Kingston or Corsair... all available from Amazon.comOpen the access area... battery compartment or entire bottom of the laptop, locate where the RAM slot is, remove the existing module by pressing down on the retaining clips, remove the module, get the new module and line up the notch in the row of metal pins at the bottom of your module with the key in the SODIMM slot on your motherboard. (If the notch doesn't line up right away, flip your module around and try it the other way. It doesn't matter which side of your module has the black chips or the stickers on it. The important thing is to line up the notch.)Hold the module at a 45-degree angle to the slot and slide it into place. No more than 1/16" of the gold contacts should be showing when the module is properly seated in the slot.MODULE:FEATURE: DDR3 PC3-10600, DDR3 PC3-12800SPECS FOR RAM: NON-ECC * DDR3-1333 * 1.35V * 512Meg x 64

Reviews.Title: Poor Service
Reviews.Author: Betty Ann Williams
Reviews.Content: I purchased this system on June 1, 2013 and received it approximately 2.5 weeks later.less than three months later the speakers stopped working and the system crashed. i thought i purchased a new system.when i contacted the seller etrador2008 i was told to contact hp directly.i will never purchase anything from etrador2008 again and i advise others to do the same.

Reviews.Title: Pleasant suprise
Reviews.Author: Steven M Usarzewicz
Reviews.Content: I've always been a Toshiba guy but couldn't pass up the price point when i went to replace my 4 year old Satellite. Other than HATING Windows 8, I'm very Very pleased with the performance of this HP.

Reviews.Title: Excellente Laptop
Reviews.Author: Rita Nieto
Reviews.Content: I have been working with hp is the maximum, i like very mucho, because your case and componentes are the quality

Reviews.Title: Low-priced laptop will serve for basic computing, web & more
Reviews.Author: Joanna Daneman
Reviews.Content: This is a good basic laptop for school or traveling or basic computing at home. The price point is really excellent, so for a college laptop or business travel laptop--or even replacing a desktop for most people, this is quite a good PC. Some of the accessories like webcam, optical drive are excellent at this price. So this is a fully-functional PC, but with some limitations for special use, like intensive gaming, video editing and heavy multi-tasking. If you are an average user who just watches HD movies and does regular computing tasks, this budget PC has a lot to offer for the price.Features:1. 15" screen is not a bad size. Not the largest you can get, but this makes the unit a compact size.2. Not really what you'd want for gaming due to the processor but I don't do any gaming.3. Screen: Has a 15 inch screen, maximum screen resolution 1366 X 768 pixels4. Memory: 4 GB DIMM. Not a lot--simply sufficient (esp if all you do is internet, email, some documents in Word and a few spreadsheets) Not expandable5. CPU Processor:  AMD Celeron E1200 1.4 GHz processor. This is a low-end processor which is why it's not great for gaming but you won't notice any problems with basic tasks. You WILL notice it if you do multi-tasking (open a few windows and run several programs simultaneously--or load in a number of photos to Photoshop Elements for editing--or try to edit a video. Then you'll see the issue with a slower processor.)6. Size: Compact. If you travel a lot, and what you do is access internet, make PowerPoint slides, this is great for the carryon. It's about 14 by 19 inches and 3 inches thick. Not the thinnest around but compact. Weighs about 5 lbs.7. Video features:  HD TrueVision, so viewing movies works great. HD Webcam, good for skyping, etc. Altec-Lansing dual speakers. Headphone jack and mic. SuperMulti DVD optical drive/burner.8. Graphics:  AMD Radeon HD 7310 Discrete-Class Graphics  1972MB total graphics memory7. Hard drive 320GB.8. Battery life around 4 hoursSummary: good, solid, inexpensive, nice-looking (shiny black) laptop works for travel, internet, webcam & skyping, watching movies, regular business tasks like Word, Spreadsheets, Powerpoint.  For gaming, graphics-intensive and multi-tasking computing, not enough power.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Chrissy Blessing
Reviews.Content: I love this computer! Works great, easy set-up, and windows 8 is great! Perfect size and storage. So glad I chose this one.

Reviews.Title: great laptop, lousy o/s
Reviews.Author: bonnie
Reviews.Content: very light, very fast, boots instantly,and has a nice keyboard.but....came with windows 8, biggest mistake of my life. win 7 was the easiest o/s to work with, win 8 is designed by son dumbs--t who doesn't understand how hard it is to change habits learned on older machines. you gotta hunt to find what you need, caution, it may not be in the new o/s. touch the wrong spot on the touch pad, it takes you hither and yon. the capping pain in the a--  is turning off the computer, they want you to hibernate instead, gotta go thru a buncha steps and screens to power down!!last minor complaint, shell is gloss black, finger print city.wonder if they offer a downgrade to win 7?

Reviews.Title: Computer
Reviews.Author: Nancy Dansby
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my nephew for graduation.  He loves it and the fact that it also takes pictures makes it awesome.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Dimples_215
Reviews.Content: For being a brand new laptop. it processes very, very, slowly. I wish that I would have investigated the specifications better. Very slow right out the box.

Reviews.Title: I Love It

Reviews.Content: I got what I paid for. I am very pleased!!! Great little laptop. Meets all my expectations and them some. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: excellent

Reviews.Content: very good product I recommend, all arrived on time, one hundred percent recommended, I have no complaints and therefore for me is an article cienco stars, really excellent

Reviews.Title: bad purchase decission
Reviews.Author: TBJ "smart cookie"
Reviews.Content: This mouse has a mind of it's own.  It moves when my hands are no where near the keyboard, it closes my page and the software and operating system is cumbersome.  I move the mouse down but it goes up! RETURNING STAT!

Reviews.Title: hp laptop
Reviews.Author: rhmurray
Reviews.Content: i enjoy my laptop...windows 8 is diffrent but do able...the only thing i would loved to see is free office like i had on my last hp laptop...but this laptop is great for the price i paid...

Reviews.Title: Nice laptop for the price
Reviews.Author: THOMAS
Reviews.Content: Does all I needed it to do.  It seems to be well made too.  Comes with Windows 8 even though the name is misleading you to think it comes with Windows 2000.

Reviews.Content: The H.P. is a great gift and the wife loves to play and do her business on it.Thanx for the great gift

Reviews.Title: HP IS RELIABLE COMPANY

Reviews.Content: Hp is a reliable company and generally easy to use.  I have some problems with the Windows 8, but I am 75 years old and it takes longer to do stuff!
